body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Nicholas Williams and the customer's name is Stephanie Morris.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Nicholas Williams, and I am a representative from Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Nicholas. I'm Stephanie Morris, and I'm feeling a bit confused about the motorcycle options available.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for introducing yourself, Stephanie. I completely understand how overwhelming it can be. What type of motorcycle are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for something that's good for both city commuting and weekend rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! We have several models that could fit your needs. Before we dive into the specifics, could I please have your phone number for follow-up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Stephanie! And may I also have your email address? It will help us send you more information on the motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information! We have some fantastic models that would meet your criteria and I’d love to go over some options with you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds great! I'm eager to hear more.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I appreciate your time today, Stephanie, and I'll make sure to send you all the details. Have a wonderful day!
